title: Island in the sun
text:
Home » travel » Island in the sun GETAWAYS THE NATION October 7, 2015 1:00 am 
Soneva Kiri in Koh Kood Soneva Kiri in Koh Kood is offering a two-night Ever Soneva So Sabai Sabai package ... TRAT Island in the sun Soneva Kiri in Koh Kood is offering a two-night Ever Soneva So Sabai Sabai package priced at Bt88,000 for two sharing. It includes private plane transfers between Don Mueang International Airport and Koh Kood, a two-night stay in Bayview Pool Villa Suite, daily breakfast and dinner, and one 50-minute spa treatment for two. Located on a remote island in the Gulf of Thailand, Soneva Kiri is a luxury resort boasting a rustic-chic design. The package is available from now until April 30. Visit www.Soneva.com. BANGKOK Splendours of the Kingdom Imagine strolling down a stretch of pristine, white sand beach one day, then visiting Thai Buddhist temples the next. Dusit is now offering a Thailand Rediscovery Ensemble package that combines two nights in Bangkok with two nights at participating Dusit resorts in Pattaya , Hua Hin or Phuket. Receive one free night for one paid night at the Dusit Best Available Rate at each destination by simply producing your reservation confirmation for the second property upon check-in. Call (02) 636 3630 extension 3630. Visit www.Dusit.com. Minibar thrown in Courtyard Bangkok by Marriott is offering a Minibar Inclusive Package starting at Bt3,050 for accommodation in a deluxe room, daily breakfast buffet for two at Momo Cafe and complimentary daily minibar. The offer is valid through October 31. Make sure that promotional code YX1 appears in the Corporate/Promotional code box when making your online reservation. Call (02) 690 1888 or visit Facebook.com/CourtyardMarriottBkk. HUA HIN Bargain break Stay one night and get the second night free with breakfast at Sheraton Hua Hin Pranburi Villas. Rates start at Bt12,000 and a minimum two-night stay is required. The offer is valid for stays booked and completed by December 19. Call (032) 708 000 or e-mail: sheraton.huahinpranburi@sheraton.com. KHAO YAI Magic in the mountains Surrounded by nature, Muthi Maya in Khao Yai is offering a Summer Bliss Spa package for two persons. The offer includes two nights' accommodation in a room of your choice, refreshing welcome drink, 60 minutes Thai massage or Aromatherapy massage at Maya Spa. Rates range from Bt11,500 to Bt44,500 and the deal is good through October 31. Call (02) 2572455-7 or e-mail: reservation@kirimaya.com. PHUKET Tropical treat A haven of tranquillity, the Diamond Cliff Resort and Spa sits on the lush hills above north Patong and offers spectacular views of the Andaman Sea. The resort is now offering up to 60-per-cent off its normal rate. Rates start at Bt2,618 per night for stays now through October 31. Call (076) 380 050 or e-mail: rsvn@diamondcliff.com. Book online at www.DiamondCliff.com. 35 Viewed
